page.title: 04Recreation Events
page.content: Throughout the year,there are many events that provide fun and entertainment for residents and visitors to Mudeford as well as raising funds for local charities. The{Mudeford Trawler Race}takes place in high summer from the Quay,where fishermen decorate their boats and then race around Christchurch Bay for the RNLI who stage a demonstration of their skills. Other events include{Guy Fawkes}bon- fire and firework display on Stanpit Marsh, {Snow Queen procession}at Christmas,{Pram Race}on Boxing Day on the Quay,{Donkey Derby}in August on Stanpit Marsh,many{sailing events}in Christchurch Bay,{power boat races viewed from the Quay.
